title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checkboxes are not updated immediately when clicked. It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
EB: The checkboxes should be updated immediately when clicked. A busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is processing the update.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the table with checkboxes.
3. Click on a checkbox.
4. Observe the update speed and lack of busy cursor.
